entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
